attributes.action: help us retain the traditional Cornish Emblem which displays the 15 Bezants,the Fisherman,the Miner and the Cornish Chough as the logo for the new Cornwall Unitary Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are totally opposed to the recently approved new logo for the Cornwall Unitary Athority. We strongly feel that it is not an identifiable symbol for Cornwall.It fails to reflect Cornwall's unique heritage and distinctive culture. We urge the Prime Minster to listen to the people of Cornwall who wish to retain the internationally recognised and respected traditional Cornish emblen.
We also ask him to look into the cost when the cost for setting up the new council has already gone three times over budget.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "help us retain the traditional Cornish Emblem which displays the 15 Bezants,the Fisherman,the Miner and the Cornish Chough as the logo for the new Cornwall Unitary Authority."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19547


Prime Minister's Office
